item.description: At the request of a few members...I have set the start time at 6 PM instead to catch more daylight on the farmington canal bike path.
item.how_to_find_us: We can meetup Behind the parking lot of the Pier One /Stop & Shop/Staples/Marshalls Shopping center. If anyone has trouble locating site, please mapquest Pier One in Hamden, CT
item.name: Run on the Farmington Canal in Hamden,CT
